info.title: Redback Core HTML Page
info.description: It's a singleton pattern implementation for Redback Core page. Builds the redback's core spine of an HTML page and sets the events to fill the blanks (modules).

prop.name: moduleID
prop.description: The module that the page will load.

prop.name: pageAttributes
prop.description: All the page's extra attributes as fetched from the database.

method.name: getInstance
method.description: Gets the instance of the RCPage.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id that the page will load.

method.name: build
method.description: Builds the spine of the page

parameter.name: $subdomain
parameter.description: The subdomain where the page will be built.

parameter.name: $static
parameter.description: Defines whether the module will be loaded asynchronously or statically.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initializes the Redback Core Page with the module id to load.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id that the page will load.

method.name: addResources
method.description: Adds the initial static resources to the page header (including initial packages for styles and javascript).

parameter.name: $subdomain
parameter.description: The subdomain where the page will be built

parameter.name: $static
parameter.description: Defines whether the module will be loaded asynchronously or statically.

method.name: buildConnectionToolbar
method.description: Builds the page account connection toolbar on the top of the page.

parameter.name: $mainContainer
parameter.description: The content container inside the page container.

method.name: getPageTitle
method.description: Gets the page title according to access status.

method.name: getPageNotification
method.description: Creates a page notification for each access status.

method.name: setStaticResources
method.description: Sets the page's resources when the page is static.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id from which the resources will be loaded.
